title: Update xlf sync tasks to particularize resource update strings
body: Once [this PR](https://github.com/fmuecke/XliffParser/pull/2) to the xliff parser gets into a nuget package, we should update our [task](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/build/LocalizationTasks/UpdateXlfFromResx.cs) to take advantage of the new functionality. This would help the localization team disambiguate between new and updated strings

nodes.body: Not needed as xlf sync moved to xlifftasks
